short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the ctrl + scroll wheel zoom shortcut in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT NOTE:

Please test this extension on any website that is NOT the Chrome web store! Chrome does not allow extensions to run any code on the store itself.
